post.body: I was so excited about getting my BlackBerry for Christmas, because I would always be linked to Twitter. Sorta like the Borg.
Yes, it did, a very frozen one at that.
Well, the first two letters give it away...
Did you see Happy Gilmore? Yeah, that's about right. :)
Thanks for the good wishes, and yes, when an angry man has a metal club clenched in his fist, he wins, no question. hehe :)
Yes, it's midnight here, but hopefully I qualify as "normal." :)
Good night, what a great line ~
I didn't know you had a new book out, so I looked it up on Amazon. Looks great, can wait to read it. Congrats ~
I use Adobe Acrobat for collaboration on docs, will that work?
Good night!
I want to do activities with hubby that he enjoys, and while his profanity is horrendous, he seems to really like it. :)
Good night ~
Keep up the good work, then. :)
It just SEEMS that way, then. :)
You make me smile
Guys don't have to watch their weight like girls do, so yes, I will eat with it with a 100% happy smile on my face. :)
Done!
Off to bed, good night all. Happy Tweeting.
RT@jmproffitt It'd be good to help out the @alaskapodshow guys with a $10+ donation to replace their busted HD camera. http://bit.ly/iotE
Thinking about learning to golf.
